name: AddViewToFolder
description:
Add various view types to a ClickUp folder.

Use this tool to add a List, Board, Calendar, Table, Timeline, Workload, Activity, Map, Chat, or Gantt view to a specific folder in ClickUp.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The unique integer ID of the ClickUp folder where the view will be added. Required for specifying the target folder.

parameters.name: view_configuration
parameters.description: A JSON object detailing the view settings such as type, name, sorting, filters, and other configurations.

type.description: The type of view to create. Options include: `list`, `board`, `calendar`, `table`, `timeline`, `workload`, `activity`, `map`, `conversation`, or `gantt`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

type.description: The type of view to create. Options include: `list`, `board`, `calendar`, `table`, `timeline`, `workload`, `activity`, `map`, `conversation`, or `gantt`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
